Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.query

OADataSourceJDBC classes used for converting OA Object Queries to SQL, and returning JDBC resultsets for ORM.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreeTextConverter
    Convert a query to freetext example: CONTAINS(tableName.*,'" + convertForFreeText(phrase) + "')"; 20180322
    QueryConverter
    Used internally for queries/selects to convert OA object queries into SQL.
    Uses JOINs or LEFT OUTER JOINS to connect super/sub classes and ONE type references.
    Uses EXISTS for MANY type references.
    Will work with any valid object path.
    Allows OR, ||, AND, &&, (), =, !=, NULL, <, <=, >, >=
    ResultSetIterator  

Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.query Description

OADataSourceJDBC classes used for converting OA Object Queries to SQL, and returning JDBC resultsets for ORM.
